Class Gateway

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
Gateway
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGatewayBrl, IGatewayCli, IGatewayDl, Serializable, Remote
public class Gateway extends UnicastRemoteObject implements IGatewayCli, IGatewayDl, IGatewayBrl
The Gateway class implements the remote interfaces IGatewayCli, IGatewayDl, and IGatewayBrl. It acts as an intermediary between clients, barrels, and downloaders manager in a distributed search engine system. The Gateway class is responsible for handling client requests, managing barrels, and downloaders.
See Also:

    • send

      public void send(String s, IClient client) throws RemoteException
      Sends a download request to the downloaders manager for a given URL. Sends an error message to the client via RMI callback if the URL is invalid or the download manager is not active, or if there are no active barrels available.
      Specified by:
      send in interface IGatewayCli
      Parameters:
      s - the URL to download.
      client - the interface of the client requesting the download.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a remote communication error.

      Subscribes a client to the Gateway by adding their interface to the clients list.
      Specified by:
      subscribe in interface IGatewayCli
      Parameters:
      c - the client interface to subscribe.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a remote communication error.

    • unsubscribe

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

    • search

      public String search(String s) throws RemoteException
      Gets the search results by choosing a random barrel to perform the search operation.
      Specified by:
      search in interface IGatewayCli
      Parameters:
      s - the query string to search for.
      Returns:
      the search results to the client. Returns "No barrels available" if there are no barrels available.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a remote communication error.

    • findSubLinks

      public String findSubLinks(String s) throws RemoteException
      Finds the sub-links of a given URL by choosing a random barrel to perform the operation.
      Specified by:
      findSubLinks in interface IGatewayCli
      Parameters:
      s - the URL to find sub-links for.
      Returns:
      The sub-links of the URL to the client. Returns "Invalid URL" if the URL is invalid or "No barrels available" if there are no barrels available.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a remote communication error.

      public void RmvDM() throws RemoteException

    • shutdown

      private void shutdown()
      Shuts down the Gateway by sending a shutdown message to all clients, barrels, and the downloaders manager. Unbinds the Gateway from the RMI registry and unexports the Gateway object. Currently not working as expected.

    • deleteQueueFile

      private void deleteQueueFile()
      Deletes the queue file used by the downloaders manager.
